title: Arlington House, The Robert  E. Lee Memorial: Calendar

Lee Memorial  Establishment of Arlington National Cemetery      Time: 11:30 AM to 12:00 PM,2:30 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Arlington House Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 05/21/2016 to 09/30/2016 See how Arlington plantation became our first national cemetery and how the cemetery today has become a place of honor, healing, and unity. View Details      Arlington House, The Robert  E. Lee Memorial  George Played Here: Arlington House      Time: 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Arlington House Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 05/21/2016 to 08/28/2016 Imagine your voice among the children in the yard and the mansion of Robert E. Lee. 15-minute ranger's-choice activity, under the big tree. View Details      Arlington House, The Robert  E. Lee Memorial  Guided Tours of Arlington House      Time: 10:00 AM to 10:45 AM,11:00 AM to 11:45 AM,12:00 PM to 12:45 PM,1:00 PM to 1:45 PM,2:00 PM to 2:45 PM,3:00 PM to 3:45 PM,4:00 PM to 4:45 PM Location: Arlington House Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 05/21/2016 to 09/30/2016 See the entire mansion and grounds and learn about upcoming restorations to this memorial. 45 minutes; maximum 20 participants.
